projects.title: Regio Vinco
projects.description: Geographic Browser Based Game meant to both teach and test player in various geographic trivia.  As the Gameplay and UI programmer for the project, I have updated the UI to be easier to follow, added two new game modes for teaching and training newer players, and fixing formatting issues and game bugs

projects.title: McBendorjee Vs. Robots
projects.description: Original Top Down Action-Puzzle Game where a college professor is trapped inside his own video game.  Created with a three person team for a 2D game development class, my primary roles were lead designer, gameplay programmer, and composer. The game was made with a custom 2D engine made by students that uses Typescript with HTML canvas to render the game to the browser.

projects.title: Top-5-Lister
projects.description: Website developed for a school project that allows users to create their top 5 lists of various categories.  Each list a user creates can be viewed by other users, where they can like, dislike, and comment.  Top 5 lists of the same name will consolidate and create community lists, where each individual user's lists count as a vote for a specific item in the list, and the items with most votes will appear in the community top 5 list
